forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. A few peeks of sunshine possible. High 17C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 11C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 52F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 56F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Thunder possible. High 57F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 63F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds light and variable.
